DOC.brief_summary: To assess effectiveness Macugen treatment neovascular age-related macular degeneration measure evolution visual acuity . Treatment duration , frequency administration combination treatment also evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: A Study On The Efficacy Of Macugen Injections In Patients With Neovascular Age-Related Macular Degeneration In Real Life .
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose subfoveal neovascular ( wet ) agerelated macular degeneration Patients receive least 1 Macugen injection Treatment naive patient , patient receive conventional therapy Patients sign date informed consent . Patients participate another clinical study Macugen .
DOC.keyword: Macugen Age-related macular degeneration ( AMD ) Observational study
